title.narrative: Joint UN Program on Health and Population - JPC3

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative is to support the One United Nations (UN) Joint Program on Health and Population (JPC3), with a focus on the nutritional needs of women and children. Specifically, the goal of the activity is to prevent malnutrition-related morbidity and mortality among under-five children and improve the nutritional status of pregnant and lactating women in selected Maternal, Neonatal and Child Health districts of Pakistan. The activity will comprise three objectives: Objective 1) to prevent malnutrition in early childhood through the promotion of improved child feeding, care giving and care seeking practices at the facility, family and community levels; Objective 2) to control acute malnutrition in children 6-59 months and keep rates below critical values (&#38;#60;10%) throughout the year in the targeted districts; and Objective 3) to set up a functional surveillance system in two districts where community and facility based management of acute malnutrition interventions are op
